pages.text: Use $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)normal Cell Medals$(/l) on this block to obtain Birth's Cell Medals$(br2)Drops with a $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medal$(/l):$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_eyes)Birth Core (Powered)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_breast_cannon)Birth Cell Medal (Breast Cannon)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_crane_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Crane Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_drill_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Drill Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_shovel_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Shovel Arm)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_catepillar_leg)Birth Cell Medal (Caterpillar Leg)$(/l) (14.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/birth_core_cutter_wing)Birth Cell Medal (Cutter Wing)$(/l) (14.3%)

Drops with packed ice:$(li)$(l:ooo/items/seiuchi_medal)Seiuchi Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/shirokuma_medal)Shirokuma Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)$(li)$(l:ooo/items/penguin_medal)Penguin Core Medal$(/l) (33.3%)
